name: Lead Generation Manager / SDR Manager

requirements: Experience in B2B sales or Lead Generation or SDR Manager for 2 years
Excellent written and verbal communication skills
Experience with CRM tools like Pipedrive
Experience with sales automation tools like Snov.io, and Sales Navigator.

details: Experience in managing complex sales processes that require multiple touches through different channels (LinkedIn, email);
Our customers are tech and engineering companies of 100+ employees in the US and European markets, so having a sales experience with a similar ICP would be a big plus.

notes: If some information regarding these requirements is missing in CV, Chatbot should ask a candidate and add this information to a new CV result file.

name: Middle React Native developer

requirements: 3+ years of experience in React Native, CSS, HTML, and TypeScript development
Comprehensive understanding and practical application of Redux architecture
Good understanding of React Context and adept at utilizing it in development
Expertise in developing cross-platform applications from scratch
Ability to collaborate within a team of developers and implement features based on project requirements
Good experience in developing and launching applications for iOS and Android.
Upper-intermediate level of English proficiency, ready to pass interviews in English.

details: Familiarity with native module development in React Native for platform-specific optimizations
Experience with continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipelines
Familiarity with GraphQL for data querying and manipulation
Bachelor`s degree in Computer Science or Math.
